channel.title: Posts on awilliams:dev
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on awilliams:dev

item.title: RPI3 Disable LEDs
item.description: To disable the LEDs on a Raspberry Pi 3, add the following to the /boot/config.txt file: dtparam=act_led_trigger=none dtparam=act_led_activelow=off dtparam=pwr_led_trigger=none dtparam=pwr_led_activelow=off More information: Raspberry Pi Guide - 5.2 Control LEDs

item.title: RTanque getting started
item.description: This is an introduction to RTanque. It covers installation of RTanque and the creation and distribution of a tank. Total time required: ~20min RTanque is a game for (Ruby) programmers. Players program the brain of a tank and then send their tank+brain into battle against other tanks. If you are comfortable installing a Ruby gem, run gem install rtanque, and skip to the Making a Tank section. Some familiarity with the command line and Ruby would be helpful.
